name: Adobe Character Animator Puppet Maker Template

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .maker file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
screenshot.caption: MAKER file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023

description: Character Animator is an Adobe Creative Cloud (CC) application for animating characters based on your movements and voice. MAKER templates are packaged with the software. You can find MAKER template files in the following location in macOS:
Macintosh HD/​Applications/​Adobe Character Animator [version]/​Adobe Character Animator [version]/​Contents/​Resources/​puppetmaker
In Character Animator, you can view puppet templates by selecting File → Open Puppet Maker... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .maker file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
images.caption: MAKER file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023
